OneLineDescription: Compatability patcher between Heights of Skyrim mod and NPC Overhauls
LongDescription:
This patcher forwards height changes from Heights_of_Skyrim.esp to the outgoing patch preserving your winning override.

Note: you should load Heights_of_Skyrim.esp as high as possible to avoid conflicts. It must be placed above NPC overhauls.
You still may need the USSEP patch for this mod.
Link to the mod: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/52057
